comment.author: 51039755@N05
comment._content: Another photo from the same position apparently taken a few minutes earlier shows the rear tank's WD number is 9265 ("Great Battles of World War 1 (1989 ) Anthony Livesey p.186) 9265 fought with 10th Tank battalion in August 1918 before being handed to the American 301st Tank battalion on 2nd September. On 30th August 1918 9265 was one of four tanks supporting the New Zealand Division. Sources: sites.google.com/site/landships/home/lists/mk-v-tanks/925... sites.google.com/site/landships/home/narratives/1918/100d...
